originalText.text: We are thrilled to have discovered the team at Karate City. Not only is our 4.5yr daughter learning vital technique & discipline, she is having so much fun! Every Sensei on the team shows genuine consideration for each child and the students ENJOY learning from them. We are grateful our daughter can build confidence & continue to broaden her skill set with every class. Couldn’t recommend more. Thank you Karate City.

originalText.text: Great karate school. I have been taking lessons with Igor for 3 months  and have never experienced such a dedicated and professional trainer before.  As for my personal results: I have lost about 11 pounds of fat and feel a lot stronger. Do not expect to become Bruce Lee in one month, but if you are looking for long term results and life long sport D-Dojo is definitely a place for you. Thank you Igor for your dedication!

originalText.text: I attended D-Dojo a while back, loved the classes although my back injuries (which caused a pinched nerve on my thigh) I got previous to joining D-Dojo and time schedule couldn't keep up with the training. The classes were very balanced in discipline, work out, and martial arts. Igor was a great instructor who cares a lot of the small stuff (postures forms, etc) and all of the Karatekas made my experience very good.

originalText.text: I took my two kids to Igor's karate academy a while ago. It's heartening to see that my kids have grown in confidence and they learnt to be self-disciplined. Now they have become more responsible of their actions. They value the saying that "with great strength, comes great responsibility". Thanks Igor! To teach my kids some valuable lessons of life...

Now they have become more responsible of their actions. They value the saying that "with great strength, comes great responsibility". Thanks Igor! To teach my kids some valuable lessons of life...

originalText.text: D-Dojo Karate has truly made a gigantic impact on my life. It's not only helped improve my physical limits, but it's also implemented a change in how I think and act towards situations. It's absolutely NYC's number one place to learn martial arts. Located in Manhattan's midtown area, D-dojo has one of the finest instructors you'll ever meet and one of the most philosophical guys around, Igor Dyavchenko. The man is a world renowned Karateka and offers some of the most important approaches to Karate training that I believe are crucial. These ideas are not only beneficial to people who want to succeed in the martial arts, but also to people who want to control physical, mental, and behavioral aspects of their bodies. He taught me about balance, breathing, and coordination and he never gave up once when trying to teach me. Kids, children, youth, adults, and any person who wants to learn an extremely important and incredibly fascinating activity, should definitely consider this. Igor offers private training, one on one instruction, hands on training, and helpful tips to lose weight that are instrumental in benefiting oneself. I highly recommend D-dojo Karate for anyone in New York City who wants to try out the Best Karate and the Best Martial Arts they could hope for.
